meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the branch of medicine that deals with the immune system.
meanings.sent1: The immunologists at the hospital are experts in understanding the immune system.
meanings.sent2: Many immunologists work tirelessly to research new treatments for diseases.
meanings.sent3: The immunologists threw a party to celebrate a breakthrough in their research.
meanings.sent4: In the world of medicine, immunologists are the superheroes fighting against illnesses.
meanings.sent5: The immunologists' dedication to their work is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The study of the immune system and its functions.
meanings.sent1: Studying immunologists helps us learn how our bodies fight off infections.
meanings.sent2: Immunologists play a crucial role in advancing our knowledge of immunity.
meanings.sent3: The class on immunologists was so interesting that everyone paid attention.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the world of immunologists is like unraveling a fascinating mystery.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on immunologists is filled with amazing discoveries.
